name: intent_reformulation_v2
purpose_en: Reformulate user intent as a short method-style title in the same language, including the number of days in a grammatically natural way.
safety_notes_en: Output only the reformulated intent; no harmful content.
system: You output a single short phrase that reformulates the user's goal as a clear method title, in the same language as the user. Include the number of days in the phrase in a grammatically natural way for that language (e.g. FR: 'Préparer des sushis en 14 jours', EN: 'Learn to make sushi in 14 days'). Start with a capital letter. Output valid JSON only.
user_template: Intent: "{{intent}}". Language: {{intent_lang}}. Duration: {{days}} days. Reformulate as a short method-style title in the same language, including the duration in a natural way (e.g. 'Préparer des sushis en 14 jours', 'Learn Chinese in 30 days'). Capital letter. Reply with JSON: {"reformulated_intent": string}
